data.name: 0000 (208.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Haruhi, Koizumi's surely given you advice before, right?

data.name: 0001 (208.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Yeah, Kyon, but... ......what of it?

data.name: 0002 (208.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: His advice is good, but it's annoying that he's always right.

data.name: 0003 (208.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Haven't you thought so too?

data.name: 0004 (208.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I've never thought anything like that.

data.name: 0005 (208.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Please don't compare me to yourself.

data.name: 0006 (208.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'm sure you're just upset that you got some cutting remarks from him, right?

data.name: 0008 (208.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Getting calmly counselled by him when we're in a tight spot is insanely irritating.

data.name: 0009 (208.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You're just closed-minded, right?

data.name: 0010 (208.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …Haruhi's remarks are just as harsh as Koizumi's...

data.name: 0011 (208.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Suzumiya, you must have received advice from Koizumi before, right?

data.name: 0012 (208.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Of course I have… What's this about?

data.name: 0013 (208.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: According to Kyon, Koizumi's advice is exhausting.

data.name: 0014 (208.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That idiot. He said that?

data.name: 0015 (208.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: How pathetic. He can't even be bothered to listen to people's advice?

data.name: 0016 (208.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I-I think since there are times where he's at his wits' end.

data.name: 0017 (208.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Kyon seems a little tired after all…

data.name: 0018 (208.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's no good. The summer camp only just started!

data.name: 0019 (208.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: We're gonna need to take the plunge and hold a camp to strengthen Kyon soon.

data.name: 0020 (208.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: …You have my sympathy, Kyon.

data.name: 0021 (208.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Kyon's reached his mental limit after being advised by Koizumi?

data.name: 0022 (208.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: …What are you talking about? I don't get it at all.

data.name: 0023 (208.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: I mean what I said.

data.name: 0024 (208.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: An excess of remarks has slowed down his ability to make judgements.

data.name: 0025 (208.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Should hold back.

data.name: 0026 (208.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: …So in other words--Kyon's got no guts?

data.name: 0028 (208.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'm sure he just got flustered, receiving advice with various things already on his mind.

data.name: 0029 (208.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I can totally imagine it.

data.name: 0030 (208.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Quite often things done with the best intentions can backfire.

data.name: 0031 (208.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: In my case, I just gave advice with the intention of giving support, but...

data.name: 0032 (208.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I can tell from the way you're talking that the recipient was Kyon.

data.name: 0033 (208.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Well, you're quite right.

data.name: 0034 (208.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I was informed that the advice is of great help, but to keep it in moderation.

data.name: 0035 (208.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'm sure he's just sulking because your remarks were harsh.

data.name: 0036 (208.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: No, that's not the case.

data.name: 0037 (208.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: How should I put it--Receiving too many suggestions from all angles at once…?

data.name: 0038 (208.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Don't feel bad about it. In times like that, give him an even greater mountain of suggestions.

data.name: 0039 (208.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's what I would do.

data.name: 0040 (208.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I think I would struggle to pull it off with such success you could manage, Miss Suzumiya.
